trans-unit.source: Decrypts the PKCS #1 key exchange data.
Key exchange allows a sender to create secret information (such as random data that can be used as a key in a symmetric encryption algorithm) and use encryption to send it to the intended recipient.
Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1KeyExchangeFormatter> to create the key exchange message using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.

It is highly recommended that you not attempt to create your own key exchange method from the basic functionality provided, because many details of the operation must be performed carefully in order for the key exchange to be successful.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1KeyExchangeDeformatter"></xref> class.

Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1KeyExchangeDeformatter.SetKey%2A> to establish the key before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1KeyExchangeDeformatter.DecryptKeyExchange%2A>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1KeyExchangeDeformatter"></xref> class with the specified key.
The instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> algorithm that holds the private key.
key is `null`.
Extracts secret information from the encrypted key exchange data.
You must specify a key before calling this method.
The key exchange data within which the secret information is hidden.
The secret information derived from the key exchange data.
The key is missing.
Gets the parameters for the PKCS #1 key exchange.
An XML string containing the parameters of the PKCS #1 key exchange operation.
Gets or sets the random number generator algorithm to use in the creation of the key exchange.
The instance of a random number generator algorithm to use.
Sets the private key to use for decrypting the secret information.
You must specify a key before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1KeyExchangeDeformatter.DecryptKeyExchange%2A>.
The instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> algorithm that holds the private key.
key is `null`.
